function.name: fn_Verify_VehicleDetails_AuthorizedTCUVIN
function.description: fn_Verify_VehicleDetails_AuthorizedTCUVIN - Function to verify vehicle details for authorized TCU VIN

function.name: fn_Verify_FuelLevel_Information_YourVehicle
function.description: fn_Verify_FuelLevel_Information_YourVehicle - Function to verify fuel level for authorized TCU VIN in Your Vehicle

parameter.value: 'Empty as 'E' on the fuel image' is displayed
'Empty as 'E' on the fuel image' is not displayed
'Full as 'F' on the fuel image' is displayed
'Full as 'F' on the fuel image' is not displayed

function.name: fn_Verify_OilLife_AuthorizedTCUVIN_YourVehicle
function.description: fn_Verify_OilLife_AuthorizedTCUVIN_YourVehicle - Function to verify Oil Life for authorized TCU VIN

function.name: fn_Click_Verify_OilLife_Information_YourVehicle
function.description: fn_Click_Verify_OilLife_Information_YourVehicle - Function to click and verify Oil Life information for authorized TCU VIN

parameter.value: 'OIL LIFE' icon is clicked is clicked
'Oil life remaining' is displayed on the screen
'Your vehicle is equipped with an intelligent' is displayed on the screen
'Your vehicle is equipped with an intelligent' is not displayed
'CHANGE ENGINE OIL SOON' is displayed on the screen
'CHANGE ENGINE OIL SOON' is not displayed
'When the engine oil life remaining is 10% or less.' is displayed on the screen
'When the engine oil life remaining is 10% or less.' is not displayed
'OIL CHANGE REQUIRED' is displayed on the screen
'When the oil life left reaches 0%.' is displayed on the screen
'When the oil life left reaches 0%.' is not displayed
'Find a Dealer' button is displayed on the screen
'Find a Dealer' button is not displayed on the screen
'Back' button is displayed on the screen
'Back' button is not displayed on the screen

function.name: fn_ClickOn_ScheduleService_OilLifeRemaining
function.description: fn_ClickOn_ScheduleService_OilLifeRemaining-Function to click on Schedule Service of Oil life remaining screen

parameter.value: Navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is clicked
Not navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is not clicked

function.name: fn_Navigate_BackFromOilLife_To_VehicleInfo
function.description: fn_Navigate_BackFromOilLife_To_VehicleInfo - Function to click on back button of Oil Life screen

parameter.value: Navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is clicked
Not navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is not clicked

function.name: fn_Click_On_ServiceAndSupport
function.description: fn_Click_On_ServiceAndSupport - Function to click on Service and Support

parameter.value: 'ODOMETER' is not displayed on the screen

function.name: fn_Verify_VehicleDetails_AuthorizedTCUVIN_ServiceAndSupport
function.description: fn_Verify_VehicleDetails_AuthorizedTCUVIN_ServiceAndSupport - Function to verify vehicle details for authorized TCU VIN for the tab Service and Support

parameter.value: 'ODOMETER' is not displayed on the screen
'Next service due at' is available under odometer
'Next service due at' is not available under odometer

function.name: fn_Click_On_NextServiceDueAt
function.description: fn_Click_On_NextServiceDueAt - Function to click on Next service due at

parameter.value: 'Next service due at' is available and clicked
'Next service due at' is not clicked

function.name: fn_Navigate_BackFromMaintenanceSchedule_To_VehicleInfo
function.description: fn_Navigate_BackFromMaintenanceSchedule_To_VehicleInfo - Function to click on back button

parameter.value: Navigated back to service and support screen
Not navigated back to service and support screen

function.description: Verify Unlock option in Vehicle Control Page

parameter.value: *** XML FILE NAME OF THE CALLED FUNCTION: fn_AuthorizedTCUVIN_VehicleInfo.xml ***
